comments:
Flattens an input tensor while preserving the batch axis (axis 0).

Arguments: inputs: Tensor input. name: The name of the layer (string). data_format: A string, one of `channels_last` (default) or `channels_first`. The ordering of the dimensions in the inputs. `channels_last` corresponds to inputs with shape `(batch, height, width, channels)` while `channels_first` corresponds to inputs with shape `(batch, channels, height, width)`.
##### Returns
* **amples**:
